title: Senior Accountant -Dynamic portfolio, International exposure
description:
Senior Accountant -Dynamic portfolio, International exposure



Are you seeking an opportunity to develop your skills within an interesting portfolio? Would you like to gain more exposure in the international financial sector? We may have the ideal opportunity for you.

One of our partners is currently looking for a Senior Accountant to join their accounting team. This role involves providing personalized services to clients by advising and providing the required operational services.

Established over 10 years ago in Luxembourg, our partner has built a strong reputation in the financial sector by growing an international portfolio and offering personalized support to clients. They focus on the growth of their clients' businesses while ensuring good corporate governance and compliance with all Luxembourgish regulations.

Joining this firm will give you the opportunity to enhance your skills in a dynamic environment that respects your lifestyle, offering flexible working hours and the possibility to attend multiple training sessions to keep your knowledge up to date with new legislation.

If you think this opportunity is the right fit for you, please do not hesitate to send us your profile.



Your Responsibilities | Accountancy - International - Holdings - Soparfi - VAT

   
   
 * You should prepare the required financial statements and reports within the required deadlines.
 * You should present your clients' accounts to the board and respond to any necessary questions
 * In this role, you will prepare the necessary financial statements.
 * As a Senior Accountant, you should prepare quarterly and other relevant reports on your clients' portfolios.
 * You should supervise the work performed by junior accountants and support their professional growth
 * Our partners expect you to manage the closing process in coordination with auditors, banks, and other relevant parties.
   
   


Profile and Career Path | Accountancy - International - Holdings - Soparfi - VAT

   
   
 * You have at least 3 years of experience as an Accountant in Luxembourg.
 * Our partners are seeking a candidate holding a Bachelor's or Master's degree.
 * Fluency in English is required due to the international scope of the portfolio. Additional language skills will be considered an asset.
 * The ideal candidate is dynamic and eager to pursue professional development.
   
   


Offer | Accountancy - International - Holdings - Soparfi - VAT

   
   
 * Our partner is prepared to offer a salary of up to €72,000 gross per year, depending on your skills and experience.
 * In this role, you will have the opportunity to benefit from flexible working hours, allowing you to manage your time between your activities and your family.
 * Multiple training opportunities are offered to help you enhance your skills.
 * Great international exposure is provided by our partner, giving you access to clients with excellent reputations in the financial market.
 * Based on your performance and that of the company, you may be eligible for a discretionary bonus offered by the firm.
 * Lunch vouchers are also provided to support you during your lunch break.




Abiomis is a boutique recruitment & advisory agency specialized in the Financial and Legal fields in Luxembourg and Belgium, offering entry level to executive management positions all over the country.

At Abiomis, we value what matters most to you. We know listening is key and, in doing so, this allows us to determine together which opportunities could suit you and your criteria best. Whether you are a candidate or company, we are here every step of the way and it will be our pleasure to assist you in your evolution.

Contact us today at +352 26 38 38 50 to discuss your next career move or have a look at our current vacancies on www.abiomis.com .
